name: Acid Flight
description:
Seeing the state of the world you decided that you want to punch the creator of existence himself on the nose.

To do so, you have to climb the Tower of Infinity.

Acid Flight follows a well known concept but plays considerably faster than similar games.

Features:

  • Fast paced, addicting gameplay
  • Highscores
  • Dazzling, dreamy graphics
  • "Grey Mode", for those who dislike dazzling graphics.
  • Full soundtrack
  • Support for Keyboard and Gamepad

Requirements:

  • 64 bit Win or Linux
  • 2 GB Ram
  • ATI HD 7700 or better
  • 2x3GHZ Processor
  • 200 MB of free disk space

Soundtrack on Bandcamp: https://thunderperfectwitchcraft.bandcamp.com/album/acid-flight
